verses.verse: And this is the thing <WH1697> that thou shalt do <WH6213> <WH8799> unto them to hallow <WH6942> <WH8763> them, to minister unto me in the Kohen's office <WH3547> <WH8763>: Take <WH3947> <WH8798> one <WH259> young <WH1121> <WH1241> bullock <WH6499>, and two <WH8147> rams <WH352> without blemish <WH8549>,

And unleavened <WH4682> bread <WH3899>, and cakes <WH2471> unleavened <WH4682> tempered <WH1101> <WH8803> with oil <WH8081>, and wafers <WH7550> unleavened <WH4682> anointed <WH4886> <WH8803> with oil <WH8081>: of wheaten <WH2406> flour <WH5560> shalt thou make <WH6213> <WH8799> them.
And thou shalt put <WH5414> <WH8804> them into one <WH259> basket <WH5536>, and bring <WH7126> <WH8689> them in the basket <WH5536>, with the bullock <WH6499> and the two <WH8147> rams <WH352>.

And Aharon <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> thou shalt bring <WH7126> <WH8686> unto the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, and shalt wash <WH7364> <WH8804> them with water <WH4325>.

And thou shalt take <WH3947> <WH8804> the garments <WH899>, and put <WH3847> <WH8689> upon Aharon <WH175> the coat <WH3801>, and the robe <WH4598> of the ephod <WH646>, and the ephod <WH646>, and the breastplate <WH2833>, and gird <WH640> <WH8804> him with the curious girdle <WH2805> of the ephod <WH646>:
And thou shalt put <WH7760> <WH8804> the mitre <WH4701> upon his head <WH7218>, and put <WH5414> <WH8804> the holy <WH6944> crown <WH5145> upon the mitre <WH4701>.
Then shalt thou take <WH3947> <WH8804> the anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081>, and pour <WH3332> <WH8804> it upon his head <WH7218>, and anoint <WH4886> <WH8804> him.
And thou shalt bring <WH7126> <WH8686> his sons <WH1121>, and put <WH3847> <WH8689> coats <WH3801> upon them.

And thou shalt gird <WH2296> <WH8804> them with girdles <WH73>, Aharon <WH175> and his sons <WH1121>, and put <WH2280> <WH8804> the bonnets <WH4021> on them: and the Kohen's office <WH3550> shall be theirs for a perpetual <WH5769> statute <WH2708>: and thou shalt consecrate <WH4390> <WH8765> <WH3027> Aharon <WH175> and his sons <WH1121>.

And thou shalt cause a bullock <WH6499> to be brought <WH7126> <WH8689> before <WH6440> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>: and Aharon <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> shall put <WH5564> <WH8804> their hands <WH3027> upon the head <WH7218> of the bullock <WH6499>.
And thou shalt kill <WH7819> <WH8804> the bullock <WH6499> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, by the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>.

And thou shalt take <WH3947> <WH8804> of the blood <WH1818> of the bullock <WH6499>, and put <WH5414> <WH8804> it upon the shofars <WH7161> of the altar <WH4196> with thy finger <WH676>, and pour <WH8210> <WH8799> all the blood <WH1818> beside <WH413> the bottom <WH3247> of the altar <WH4196>.

And thou shalt take <WH3947> <WH8804> all the fat <WH2459> that covereth <WH3680> <WH8764> the inwards <WH7130>, and the caul <WH3508> that is above the liver <WH3516>, and the two <WH8147> kidneys <WH3629>, and the fat <WH2459> that is upon them, and burn <WH6999> <WH8689> them upon the altar <WH4196>.

But the flesh <WH1320> of the bullock <WH6499>, and his skin <WH5785>, and his dung <WH6569>, shalt thou burn <WH8313> <WH8799> with fire <WH784> without <WH2351> the camp <WH4264>: it is a sin offering <WH2403>.
Thou shalt also take <WH3947> <WH8799> one <WH259> ram <WH352>; and Aharon <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> shall put <WH5564> <WH8804> their hands <WH3027> upon the head <WH7218> of the ram <WH352>.
And thou shalt slay <WH7819> <WH8804> the ram <WH352>, and thou shalt take <WH3947> <WH8804> his blood <WH1818>, and sprinkle <WH2236> <WH8804> it round about <WH5439> upon the altar <WH4196>.

And thou shalt cut <WH5408> <WH8762> the ram <WH352> in pieces <WH5409>, and wash <WH7364> <WH8804> the inwards <WH7130> of him, and his legs <WH3767>, and put <WH5414> <WH8804> them unto his pieces <WH5409>, and unto his head <WH7218>.

And thou shalt burn <WH6999> <WH8689> the whole ram <WH352> upon the altar <WH4196>: it is a burnt offering <WH5930> unto the YY <WH3068>: it is a sweet <WH5207> savour <WH7381>, an offering made by fire <WH801> unto the YY <WH3068>.

And thou shalt take <WH3947> <WH8804> the other <WH8145> ram <WH352>; and Aharon <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> shall put <WH5564> <WH8804> their hands <WH3027> upon the head <WH7218> of the ram <WH352>.

Then shalt thou kill <WH7819> <WH8804> the ram <WH352>, and take <WH3947> <WH8804> of his blood <WH1818>, and put <WH5414> <WH8804> it upon the tip <WH8571> of the right ear <WH241> of Aharon <WH175>, and upon the tip <WH8571> of the right <WH3233> ear <WH241> of his sons <WH1121>, and upon the thumb <WH931> of their right <WH3233> hand <WH3027>, and upon the great toe <WH931> of their right <WH3233> foot <WH7272>, and sprinkle <WH2236> <WH8804> the blood <WH1818> upon the altar <WH4196> round about <WH5439>.

And thou shalt take <WH3947> <WH8804> of the blood <WH1818> that is upon the altar <WH4196>, and of the anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081>, and sprinkle <WH5137> <WH8689> it upon Aharon <WH175>, and upon his garments <WH899>, and upon his sons <WH1121>, and upon the garments <WH899> of his sons <WH1121> with him: and he shall be hallowed <WH6942> <WH8804>, and his garments <WH899>, and his sons <WH1121>, and his sons <WH1121> ' garments <WH899> with him.

Also thou shalt take <WH3947> <WH8804> of the ram <WH352> the fat <WH2459> and the rump <WH451>, and the fat <WH2459> that covereth <WH3680> <WH8764> the inwards <WH7130>, and the caul <WH3508> above the liver <WH3516>, and the two <WH8147> kidneys <WH3629>, and the fat <WH2459> that is upon them, and the right <WH3225> shoulder <WH7785>; for it is a ram <WH352> of consecration <WH4394>:

And one <WH259> hallah <WH3603> of bread <WH3899>, and one <WH259> cake <WH2471> of oiled <WH8081> bread, and one <WH259> wafer <WH7550> out of the basket <WH5536> of the matzah <WH4682> that is before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>:

And thou shalt put <WH7760> <WH8804> all in the hands <WH3709> of Aharon <WH175>, and in the hands <WH3709> of his sons <WH1121>; and shalt wave <WH5130> <WH8689> them for a wave offering <WH8573> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>.

And thou shalt receive <WH3947> <WH8804> them of their hands <WH3027>, and burn <WH6999> <WH8689> them upon the altar <WH4196> for a burnt offering <WH5930>, for a sweet <WH5207> savour <WH7381> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>: it is an offering made by fire <WH801> unto the YY <WH3068>.

And thou shalt take <WH3947> <WH8804> the breast <WH2373> of the ram <WH352> of Aharon's <WH175> consecration <WH4394>, and wave <WH5130> <WH8689> it for a wave offering <WH8573> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>: and it shall be thy part <WH4490>.

And thou shalt sanctify <WH6942> <WH8765> the breast <WH2373> of the wave offering <WH8573>, and the shoulder <WH7785> of the heave offering <WH8641>, which is waved <WH5130> <WH8717>, and which is heaved up <WH7311> <WH8717>, of the ram <WH352> of the consecration <WH4394>, even of that which <WH834> is for Aharon <WH175>, and of that which is for his sons <WH1121>:

And it shall be Aharon's <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> ' by a statute <WH2706> for ever <WH5769> from the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: for it is an heave offering <WH8641>: and it shall be an heave offering <WH8641> from the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> of the sacrifice <WH2077> of their peace offerings <WH8002>, even their heave offering <WH8641> unto the YY <WH3068>.
And the holy <WH6944> garments <WH899> of Aharon <WH175> shall be his sons <WH1121> ' after <WH310> him, to be anointed <WH4888> therein, and to be consecrated <WH4390> <WH8763> <WH3027> in them.

And that son <WH1121> that is Kohen <WH3548> in his stead shall put <WH3847> <WH8799> them on seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>, when he cometh <WH935> <WH8799> into the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> to minister <WH8334> <WH8763> in the holy <WH6944> place.
And thou shalt take <WH3947> <WH8799> the ram <WH352> of the consecration <WH4394>, and seethe <WH1310> <WH8765> his flesh <WH1320> in the holy <WH6918> place <WH4725>.

And Aharon <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> shall eat <WH398> <WH8804> the flesh <WH1320> of the ram <WH352>, and the bread <WH3899> that is in the basket <WH5536>, by the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>.

And they shall eat <WH398> <WH8804> those things wherewith the atonement was made <WH3722> <WH8795>, to consecrate <WH4390> <WH8763> <WH3027> and to sanctify <WH6942> <WH8763> them: but a stranger <WH2114> <WH8801> shall not eat <WH398> <WH8799> thereof, because they are holy <WH6944>.

And if ought of the flesh <WH1320> of the consecrations <WH4394>, or of the bread <WH3899>, remain <WH3498> <WH8735> unto the morning <WH1242>, then thou shalt burn <WH8313> <WH8804> the remainder <WH3498> <WH8737> with fire <WH784>: it shall not be eaten <WH398> <WH8735>, because it is holy <WH6944>.

And thus shalt thou do <WH6213> <WH8804> unto Aharon <WH175>, and to his sons <WH1121>, according to all things which I have commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> thee: seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> shalt thou consecrate <WH4390> <WH8762> <WH3027> them.

And thou shalt offer <WH6213> <WH8799> every day <WH3117> a bullock <WH6499> for a sin offering <WH2403> for atonement <WH3725>: and thou shalt cleanse <WH2398> <WH8765> the altar <WH4196>, when thou hast made an atonement <WH3722> <WH8763> for it, and thou shalt anoint <WH4886> <WH8804> it, to sanctify <WH6942> <WH8763> it.

Seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> thou shalt make an atonement <WH3722> <WH8762> for the altar <WH4196>, and sanctify <WH6942> <WH8765> it; and it shall be an altar <WH4196> most holy <WH6944> <WH6944>: whatsoever toucheth <WH5060> <WH8802> the altar <WH4196> shall be holy <WH6942> <WH8799>.
Now this is that which thou shalt offer <WH6213> <WH8799> upon the altar <WH4196>; two <WH8147> lambs <WH3532> of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141> day <WH3117> by day <WH3117> continually <WH8548>.
The one <WH259> lamb <WH3532> thou shalt offer <WH6213> <WH8799> in the morning <WH1242>; and the other <WH8145> lamb <WH3532> thou shalt offer <WH6213> <WH8799> at even <WH6153>:

And with the one <WH259> lamb <WH3532> a tenth <WH6241> deal of flour <WH5560> mingled <WH1101> <WH8803> with the fourth part <WH7253> of an hin <WH1969> of beaten <WH3795> oil <WH8081>; and the fourth part <WH7243> of an hin <WH1969> of wine <WH3196> for a drink offering <WH5262>.

And the other <WH8145> lamb <WH3532> thou shalt offer <WH6213> <WH8799> at even <WH6153>, and shalt do <WH6213> <WH8799> thereto according to the meat offering <WH4503> of the morning <WH1242>, and according to the drink offering <WH5262> thereof, for a sweet <WH5207> savour <WH7381>, an offering made by fire <WH801> unto the YY <WH3068>.

This shall be a continual <WH8548> burnt offering <WH5930> throughout your generations <WH1755> at the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>: where I will meet <WH3259> <WH8735> you, to speak <WH1696> <WH8763> there unto thee.
And there I will meet <WH3259> <WH8738> with the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and the tabernacle shall be sanctified <WH6942> <WH8738> by my glory <WH3519>.

And I will sanctify <WH6942> <WH8765> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, and the altar <WH4196>: I will sanctify <WH6942> <WH8762> also both Aharon <WH175> and his sons <WH1121>, to minister to me in the Kohen's office <WH3547> <WH8763>.
And I will dwell <WH7931> <WH8804> among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and will be their 'Elohim <WH430>.

And they shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068> their 'Elohim <WH430>, that brought them forth <WH3318> <WH8689> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, that I may dwell <WH7931> <WH8800> among <WH8432> them: I am the YY <WH3068> their 'Elohim <WH430>.
